name: AJ Fernandez - New World - Dorado - Figurado
additionalNotes: The Dorado is the fifth release of the ever-popular New World brand, which was started by AJ Fernandez and his father Isamel. The cigar’s named refers to AJ’s Dorado farm in Esteli, Nicaragua. When AJ first started to work the land, he noticed it had a dorado (or golden hue) to it. The New World Dorado is a Nicaraguan puro that uses tobacco grown from this farm for its wrapper, binder and parts of its filler. The cigars are handmade in Nicaragua and offer a medium bodied smoking experience that will delight fans of this iconic brand.
